name: Exitus Swarm
description:
Dont forget to  rate the game it helps allot

-Convert enemies and use them as your own weapon in a top down bullet hell-

While being a super-intelligent microorganism, it's now your time to proof your superiorness and to infect a human host. You have to work forward through the human body. But be aware! The immune system already noticed your presence, so it will try everything it can to stop you!

Controls:

AWSD - Move

Mouse - Rotation

Leftclick - Shoot

Q - Command all minions to follow you

E - Command all minions to attack nearby T-cells

Space - Vomit onto T-cells to debuff them. They will explode on death, when debuffed.
